::Dachande::

    He reached the neutral base and transformed to robot mode=
. Then he cloaked. Listening to anyone who sounded interested he overheard =
Red Bolt. He decloaked in front of him.
    "Hello," He said. "Please do no=
t fire, I am here to offer an alliance from Magmatron of the Destrons."
  -=

oogroups.com

ng begins


  "Say, Red Bolt, Remember those ruins we found south of the al=
liance base?" 
  "Yes?"Red Bolt replied. "Suppose we salvage what was left =
of that base and 
  began building a new one in Australia? It might be a go=
od place to train new 
  recruits, and prepare an effective peace keeping f=
orce." "Yes," Red Bolt 
  replied. "Yes, if only we could recruit a few tro=
ops, it would make an 
  excellent base."
